products.title: Halden Linen Limestone Roman Blind
products.description: It doesn't get much smarter or more sophisticated than this halden linen limestone roman blind. A contemporary grey fabric with lots of texture surrounded on three sides by a gorgeous charcoal skinny border. Roman blinds are superb for making a room feel softer, cosier and more it doesn't get much smarter or more sophisticated than this halden linen limestone roman blind.

products.title: Accents Linen Roman Blind
products.description: Sage is a colour thats growing in popularity, bringing a similar neutral chic as greys, with added organic appeal thanks to its natural green tone. Its used to beautiful effect here, crafted into a stylishly slim border that frames a sumptuously soft and creamy base fabric.

products.title: Bernal Dove Roman Blind
products.description: Struggling to choose between two shades, two patterns or even two textures? Their bordered roman blinds make it easier by letting you have both. And the bernal dove roman blind ticks all of the boxes. Their bordered roman blinds make it easier by letting you have both.

products.title: Dakota Linen Desert Gold Roman Blind
products.description: Mustard and grey is a combination that looks like it's here to stay. We can see why with this dakota linen desert gold roman blind. A grey base fabric surrounded on three sides by a mimosa gold border looks absolutely stunning. You can easily find a place for this combo in your h mustard and grey is a combination that looks like it's here to stay.

products.title: Avon Linen Weave Roman Blind
products.description: A beautiful pairing of neutral tones and delicately executed textures dress one another in a way thats sweet and serene, upon the avon linen weave roman blind. products.title: Plumpton Linen Rouge Roman Blind
products.description: Sophisticated, suave and ever so sumptuous. The plumpton linen rouge roman blind carries all sorts of regal air to it, from the rich red fabric to the velvety texture. products.title: Linen Chic Roman Blind
products.description: The linen chic roman blind brings together the ever so popular linen natural fabric with its darker eternity linen counterpart to create one beautiful and powerful combination.
